title: New Business Account Executive, Apps (English, Turkish, Arabic)
description:
Businesses that partner with Google come in all shapes, sizes and market caps, and no one Google advertising solution works for all. Your knowledge of online media combined with your communication skills and analytical abilities shapes how new and existing businesses grow. Using your relationship-building skills, you provide Google-caliber client service, research and market analysis. You anticipate how decisions are made, persistently explore and uncover the business needs of Google's key clients and understand how our range of product offerings can grow their business. Working with them, you set the vision and the strategy for how their advertising can reach thousands of users.

Google Customer Solutions (GCS) sales teams are trusted advisors and competitive sellers who maintain a relentless focus on customer success by bringing the best Google has to offer to small- and medium-sized businesses (SMBs), which are the backbone of our communities. As a member of our team, you’ll have the opportunity to work with company owners and make a real difference in their businesses by helping them grow.  Together, we help shape the future of innovation for customers, partners, and sellers...and we have fun doing it.
key_qualifications: Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience. 2 years of experience within the apps industry, within new business sales and exceeding quota attainment. Ability to communicate in English and either Turkish or Arabic fluently to support client relationships in the region.
preferred_qualifications: Experience planning and delivering compelling media plans and proposals with effective communication and influencing skills. Understanding of measurement and tracking within the apps space. Ability to work in a fast-paced, constantly-evolving environment.
responsibilities: Work closely with our leadership team on building out our apps acquisition strategy for EMEA. Build a pipeline of app business by proactively identifying and initiating relationships with new app clients. Acquire high value app business agreements through outbound prospecting, cold calling, pitching, and closing Consult with clients to achieve national and international online marketing and business goals, utilizing the full suite of Google’s apps marketing solutions including UAC. Design marketing strategies to drive long-­term success for our customer. Deliver consistently against strategic goals, while prioritizing and delivering an outstanding experience to Google's advertisers across EMEA.
